get.description: Get basic system status
Get system status (authenticated endpoint)

Get WebSocket connection statistics

Returns information about:
- Active connections
- Channel subscriptions
- Message throughput

Get statistics for all circuit breakers

Returns comprehensive metrics including:
- Circuit state (CLOSED, HALF_OPEN, OPEN)
- Failure/success counts
- Success rate and health score
- Exponential backoff timing

post.description:
Manually reset a circuit breaker

Use this endpoint to force a circuit breaker back to CLOSED state
after resolving the underlying issue.

get.description: Get detailed stats for a specific circuit breaker

Get comprehensive AI analysis for a specific trading bot

Features:
- SWOT analysis (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats)
- Market sentiment analysis
- Risk assessment
- Actionable recommendations
- Confidence scoring

Get AI-powered market sentiment analysis for a trading pair

Analyzes:
- Technical indicators
- Volume trends
- Price momentum
- Social media sentiment (if available)
- News sentiment (if available)

Get comprehensive cache system information

Returns:
- Hit/miss statistics
- Redis memory usage
- Cache warming status
- Performance metrics

post.description:
Invalidate all cache entries matching a pattern

Example patterns:
- "market_data:*" - All market data
- "user:123:*" - All data for user 123
- "*BTC*" - All entries containing BTC

Clear entire cache (use with caution)

This will delete all cached entries and may cause
temporary performance degradation until cache repopulates.

Start cache warming for a specific entry

Cache warming proactively refreshes cache entries
before they expire, preventing cache misses.
Stop cache warming for a specific entry

get.description:
Get detailed cache statistics

Includes:
- Hit rate percentage
- Total hits/misses
- Error count
- Warming task status
Get cache warmer service status

schema.title: Response Get Cache Warmer Status Api Cache Warmer Status Get
Response Trigger Warmup Api Cache Warmer Warmup Post
Response Start Cache Warmer Api Cache Warmer Start Post
Response Stop Cache Warmer Api Cache Warmer Stop Post

get.description: Comprehensive health check endpoint

Kubernetes liveness probe - checks if app is running
Returns 200 if app is alive

Kubernetes readiness probe - checks if app is ready to serve traffic
Returns 200 only if all critical components are healthy
